text: this is a weird one, I don't remember it always being this way and seems more like a bug/glitch than an actual idea

It's gotten to the point where I'm answering this question at least 1-2 times per week in the HS Community. There is no indication to the user that they should configure language settings when they connect their DNS and the prefix in slug is on by default, which causes the root domain to produce a 404 error. <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Turn-off-Language-Slug-by-default/idi-p/994423#M183186|Please upvote this idea>!
Indeed, this should be considered to be adjusted soon!

Reminder: If you had a magic wand and could have any feature in HubSpot what would it be? Post your idea to the idea forum, then link to it from here so folks can help upvote your idea. Upvotes help HubSpotters quantify demand for functionality and influence our prioritization.
